about_the_game:
No Friends is a first person adventure game from Weirder Games, winner of "Best Mommy's Boy" award. As the main character of the longest running sitcom, you have to make some though decision to make the final episode show better. Since the final episode is on live rather than pre recorded, everything you do will be seen by the whole world immediately. The final episode must be legendary, you must make it legendary.

Story Driven

No Friends is the world's first story driven video game where your choices doesn't matter that much.

Indie

It's an indie video game, which I heard makes it good.

Funny Jokes

Much funny jokes, buy game please.

Single Player

Much like developer's life, this game is single player.

No Friends - The World's Longest Running Sitcom



For 25 years, the world has laughed and cried with the characters of the beloved sitcom, "No Friends" As the show comes to a close, you step into the shoes of the lead actor, tasked with making the final episode one that will be talked about for years to come.

With no commercial breaks and no stopping, you must navigate the chaos of the final episode, determined to leave your mark on television history. You'll need to work with your fellow actors, to bring the show to a satisfying conclusion, all while dealing with unexpected twists and turns along the way.

As you prepare for the final curtain call, you'll be faced with difficult choices and the pressure to deliver a performance that will be remembered long after the show is over. Will you rise to the challenge and create a legendary finale for "No Friends" or will the weight of the moment prove too much to bear? The fate of the show and your legacy as an actor are in your hands.
